metadata.name: king ofclubs
metadata.description:
This video is from the play Cards Collection.
The Illustration of the King Of Clubs -which the video is based on- was first created with the technique of oil painting on wood in 2019.
In the design of these cards, Persian calligraphy (Nastaliq) was used.
Photoshop and moho were used in the process of making this video.

________________

Project setting : 24 f/s , 1080*1080 , 1:1 , 13.86 mb
Softwares : photoshop , moho
________________

Illistrator : @afshinbagheri66
Animation : @rad.azam
